    def _group_flush(self,group,name):

        """Flush a given job group



        Return True if the group had any elements."""



        njobs = len(group)

        if njobs:

            plural = {1:''}.setdefault(njobs,'s')

            print('Flushing %s %s job%s.' % (njobs,name,plural))

            group[:] = []

            return True
